title: Serbia - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Serbia stands at BB+ with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Serbia was last set at Ba2 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Serbia was last reported at BB+ with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Serbia thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Serbia as reported by major credit rating agencies.
